A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrendous movie that spits on every fan's face. This smart director\, who thinks he's so smart\, has managed to destroy a whole universe in a single movie. Well done\, sir\, well done. Way stronger than a death star. \nSo what's the point of this trilogy anyway? Movie 7 was copy-pasted from movie 4. Movie 8 just destroys everything. So\, what has this trilogy (with already 2 films out of 3) accomplished so far? The political context is nowhere. Hell\, we've got to a situation even worse than at the begining of movie 4! So what was the point of the whole original trilogy?\nWell done guys\, truly\, well done. You've lost a star wars fan forever. No way I'm gonna see movie 9. No way i'm gonna give a penny to the star wars franchise anymore. I hope you guys are proud of yourselves.
